code: import{LOADING_FINISHED,LOADING_STARTED}from"./types";export function widgetLoadingReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case LOADING_STARTED:return state+1;case LOADING_FINISHED:return state-1;default:return state;}}
